trans-unit.source: Specifies the state of a row in a data control, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir status for en rad i en kontroll for data som <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataControlRowState enumeration identifies the state of a row in a data control such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Opplistingen DataControlRowState identifiserer tilstand for en rad i en data-kontroll for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A row's state can be one or a combination of the DataControlRowState values, so use bitwise operations to determine whether the state of the row includes a DataControlRowState value, rather than an equivalence test.
trans-unit.target: Status for en rad kan være en eller en kombinasjon av DataControlRowState verdier, så Bruk bitvis operasjoner for å finne ut om statusen til raden inneholder en DataControlRowState-verdi, i stedet for en likhet test.

trans-unit.source: The DataControlRowState enumeration is used for any type of row, not just <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> rows (typically, the state of header and footer rows is set to Normal).
trans-unit.target: Opplistingen DataControlRowState brukes for alle typer raden, ikke bare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>rader (vanligvis tilstanden for topp-og bunntekst er satt til Normal).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: You can use the DataControlRowState enumeration to identify the state of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object when enumerating through a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> collection, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke DataControlRowState opplistingen til å identifisere tilstanden til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objekt under opplisting via en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>samling, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: If you are writing a data control that uses rows, you can use the DataControlRowState enumeration to identify when to render different colors for a row (the Alternate value), or controls that are enabled or disabled for editing a row (the Edit and Insert values).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du skriver et data-kontroll som bruker rader, kan du bruke DataControlRowState opplistingen til å identifisere når du skal gjengi forskjellige farger for en rad (alternativ verdi), eller kontroller som er aktivert eller deaktivert for å redigere en rad (Rediger og Sett inn verdier).

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the data control row is an alternate row.
trans-unit.target: Angir at kontrollen dataraden er en alternativ rad.

trans-unit.source: The Alternate state can be combined with other states, such as Normal, Edit, or Insert, at any time.
trans-unit.target: Den alternative tilstanden kan kombineres med andre tilstander, for eksempel Normal, Rediger eller Insert-, når som helst.

trans-unit.source: These rows might be affected by the `AlternateRowStyle` property of the data control, if set.
trans-unit.target: Disse radene kan bli påvirket av den `AlternateRowStyle` egenskapen dataene kontrollere, hvis angitt.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the row is in an edit state, often the result of clicking an edit button for the row.
trans-unit.target: Angir at raden har en Rediger tilstand, ofte resultatet av å klikke redigeringsknappen for raden.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Edit and Insert states are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, Rediger og Sett inn tilstander utelukker hverandre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the row is a new row, often the result of clicking an insert button to add a new row.
trans-unit.target: Angir at raden er en ny rad, ofte resultatet av å klikke Sett inn-knappen for å legge til en ny rad.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Insert and Edit states are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis utelukker Insert og Rediger tilstander hverandre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the data control row is in a normal state.
trans-unit.target: Angir at kontrollen dataraden er på en vanlig tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The Normal state is mutually exclusive with other states except the Alternate state.
trans-unit.target: Normal-tilstanden er andre tilstander unntatt tilstanden alternative utelukker hverandre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the row has been selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Angir at raden har blitt valgt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
